title: Sr. Digital Marketing Director
bio: Erin is pushing the boundaries of what's possible in marketing in the AI era. As Sr. Digital Marketing Director at e360, she's spent 15+ years as a technically-focused, entrepreneurial marketer, and over the past six months has added what feels like true engineering expertise to her toolkit. She believes marketing teams will increasingly build and iterate on temporary tools themselves while partnering with developers at key stages, unlocking solutions that previously didn't make economic or time sense and enabling faster, more innovative problem-solving.
